# Jupyter Notebook inputs and outputs for manuscript *Influence of Structural Maturity on the Rupture Morphology of the Northern Alpine Fault, Aotearoa New Zealand* 



https://doi.org/10.1029/2025JB031578





There are two main codes here to calculate fault zone width for either distributed traces, and/or principal fault traces. It includes the input shapefiles, and outputs. 



Jupyter notebook codes require ArcGIS Pro installed on computer as ArcPy is imported.
